description: This is a citation for a record of conference proceedings (CP).

CP-author.title: CP-author
CP-author.description: Author(s) of the conference, in alphabetical order, written as <first name><space><middle name><space><last name><comma>
examples: Annalisa Angelini, Gerald Berry, Margaret Burke, Maria G. Crespo-Leiro, Lawrence Czer, Stephan M. Ensminger, Nicola Hiemann, Abdallah G. Kfoury, Jon Kobashigawa, Donna Mancini, Paul Mohacsi, Jignesh Patel, Naveen Pereira, Jeffrey L.Platt, Elaine F. Reed, Hermann Reichenspurner, Nancy Reinsmoen, E. Rene Rodriguez, Marlene L.Rose, Stuart D.Russell, Randy Starling, Nicole Suciu-Foca, Jose Tallaj, David O.Taylor, Adrian Van Bakel, Lori West, Adriana Zeevi, Andreas Zuckermann, Consensus Conference Participants

CP-title.title: CP-title
examples: Report from a consensus conference on antibody-mediated rejection in heart transplantation

CP-pages.title: CP-pages
CP-pages.description: Page range of the published conference proceedings

CP-year.title: CP-year
CP-year.description: Year the conference proceedings report was published

CP-publication_name.title: CP-publication_name
examples: The Journal of Heart and Lung Transplant

CP-city.title: CP-city
CP-city.description: The city the publisher is located in

CP-publisher.title: CP-publisher
CP-publisher.description: Name of the publisher of the journal/other that the conference proceedings were published in

CP-DOI.title: CP-DOI
CP-DOI.description: Optional field for the DOI of the report of the conference proceedings, if available
